title: AuthorReference
description: A object that holds contributor/author name and the reference id.

name.description: a single field to describe the first, middle, last names of an unique author per reference.   This can be of many forms: First Last or Last First or Last First_initial or First_initial Last, etc.

firstName.description: first name or first initial of the author when available.

lastName.description: last name of the author when available.

middleNames.description: middle name or middle initial of the author when available.

referenceId.description: The globally unique identifier for the resource.  ie: NLMId or ISBN or MOD ID.  Each identifier should be prefixed and of the form prefix:id
